description:
Granedger hosts a signing ceremony to become an independent nation. As the world`s powers gather on the ship, http://anidb.net/ch114628 [Arrow] and http://anidb.net/ch114620 [Shu] visit Rekka for some awkward diplomacy.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hito ga Heiwa o Nozomu Toki, Kami wa Nani o Horisuruka
When People Want Peace, What Does God Want?
人が平和を望む時, 神は何を欲するか
